tool_description: Real Estate License Verification API. Search for information about businesses, brokers, and salespeople that hold a real estate license.
name: Realify
title: Realify

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realify.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
